result.html: Is cuimhin liom gach rudI remember everything.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom gaċ rudI remember everything.

result.html: Ní cuimhin liom tadaI don't remembr anything.
result.ponchtml: Ní cuiṁin liom tadaI don't remembr anything.

result.eng: I don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ga: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.orig: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.html: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ponchtml: Ní cuiṁin liom gaċ pioc den scéal aċ is cuiṁin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.

result.eng: He had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ga: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.orig: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.html: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí madraí leis Ní cuiṁin liom aċ a gcuid fiacla ag drannaḋ orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.

result.eng: If I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ga: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.orig: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.html: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃuail mé leo áfaċ ní cuiṁin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.

result.eng: I well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.
result.ga: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháin
result.orig: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháin
result.html: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháinI well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ is cuiṁin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair aṁáinI well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.

result.eng: I remember that she added a lot to the course.
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom gur chuir sí go mór leis an chúrsa
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom gur chuir sí go mór leis an chúrsa
result.html: Is cuimhin liom gur chuir sí go mór leis an chúrsaI remember that she added a lot to the course.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom gur ċuir sí go mór leis an ċúrsaI remember that she added a lot to the course.

result.eng: I remember waking up Sunday morning, crying.
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom dúiseacht maidin Dé Domhnaigh agus mé ag caoineadh
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom dúiseacht maidin Dé Domhnaigh agus mé ag caoineadh
result.html: Is cuimhin liom dúiseacht maidin Dé Domhnaigh agus mé ag caoineadhI remember waking up Sunday morning, crying.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom dúiseaċt maidin Dé Doṁnaiġ agus mé ag caoineaḋI remember waking up Sunday morning, crying.

result.eng: I remember one thing I did.
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne mé
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne mé
result.html: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne méI remember one thing I did.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom rud aṁáin a rinne méI remember one thing I did.

result.eng: He remembers an incident that happened one day.
result.ga: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla lá
result.orig: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla lá
result.html: Is cuimhin leis eachtra a tharla láHe remembers an incident that happened one day.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin leis eaċtra a ṫarla láHe remembers an incident that happened one day.

result.eng: I remember that I often used to say to people...
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minic
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minic
result.html: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minicI remember that I often used to say to people...
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minicI remember that I often used to say to people...

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.html: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: Deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an Uaċtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: Very few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ga: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.orig: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.html: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ponchtml: Is beag duine ar doṁan gur cuiṁin leis lá an ḋúnṁaraiṫe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.

result.eng: I remember well the afternoon I left.
result.ga: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh mé
result.orig: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh mé
result.html: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh méI remember well the afternoon I left.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ is cuiṁin liom an tráṫnóna a d'imiġ méI remember well the afternoon I left.
